headline: Equinix Appoints Yang Song as SVP, Chief Data Science and AI Officer
summary: Equinix, Inc. (Nasdaq: EQIX), the world's digital infrastructure company®, today announced the appointment of Yang Song, Ph.D., as SVP, Chief Data Science and AI Officer—effective immediately, reporting to Harmeen Mehta, Executive Vice President and Chief Digital and Innovation Officer.

(Nasdaq: EQIX), the world's digital infrastructure company®, today announced the appointment of Yang Song, Ph.D., as SVP, Chief Data Science and AI Officer—effective immediately, reporting to Harmeen Mehta, Executive Vice President and Chief Digital and Innovation Officer.
